>
[Reason Rapidly](/Feats.aspx?ID=5965) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Investigator" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=818" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 111 <sup>1.1</sup>

</column>

---

Your mind works through clues at an unbelievable speed. You instantly use up to five [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367) actions. If you have any special abilities or free actions that would normally be triggered when you Recall Knowledge, you can't use them for these actions.
